item.title: 「Meme Coin」 Google Search Volume Hits Highest Level Since February 2018
item.description: On August 14th, based on Google Trends data, the Google search volume for "Altcoin" skyrocketed to 77 yesterday, attaining the highest level since February 2018.

item.title: Two cryptocurrency exchanges stake 320,000 ETH, approximately $1.51 billion
item.description: On August 14th, according to Ashes Monitor, two cryptocurrency exchanges have staked 320,000 ETH, which is approximately $15.1 billion.BitFlyer is staking 240,000 ETH (about $11.34 billion). It announced the launch of the Ethereum staking feature two days ago and then started staking ETH. So far, 240,000 ETH has been transferred to the staking execution address for staking deposit.Binance is staking 80,000 ETH (approximately $3.78 billion). Half an hour ago, Binance transferred 80,000 ETH to the staking execution address and staked all of them.

item.title: A new address withdrew $5.05 million worth of LINK from Binance.
item.description: On August 14th, according to on-chain analyst Ai Auntie (@ai_9684xtpa), a new address withdrew 210,924 LINK from Binance 6 hours ago. The amount withdrawn was worth $5.05 million.

item.title: Binance Alpha's new round of OVL airdrop yielded approximately $55.5 at the opening price.
item.description: On August 14th, according to market data, Overlay Protocol (OVL) has been listed on Binance Alpha. It is currently trading at $0.5, and the market capitalization is $8.05 million. Each eligible user can receive a 111 OVL token airdrop. Based on the current price, the estimated value of this airdrop is approximately $55.5.

item.title: Fed's Daly: A Sharp Rate Cut Next Month Seems Inappropriate
item.description: On August 14th, as reported by The Wall Street Journal, Fed's Powell said that it seems inappropriate to have a significant rate cut next month.

item.title: A whale deposited 39,875 SOL into Bybit, with an unrealized gain of $2.93 million
item.description: On August 14th, as per the monitoring of Onchain Lens, a whale transferred 39,875 SOL into Bybit (amounting to approximately $8.9 million), and it had an unrealized gain of $2.93 million.

item.title: Binance: Overlay Protocol (OVL) Airdrop Distribution to Resume at 16:45
item.description: August 14th. According to official information, Binance announced that the distribution of the Overlay Protocol (OVL) token airdrop will resume at 16:45 (UTC+8).

item.title: BiyaPay is excited to announce the launch of a promotion where completing a stock transaction will earn you a $50 USDT cash reward.
item.description: On August 14th, as per official channels, BiyaPay declared that users are able to deposit funds into BiyaPay by using the same recharge address as that on the original platform. And by completing any stock transaction, they can receive a $50 USDT cash reward.BiyaPay attaches great importance to asset security with multiple risk control measures and fund isolation. It provides a simple process, transparent cash withdrawal, and seamless user migration for secure transactions.

item.title: Suspected HashKey Capital Address Sells 7300 ETH, Approximately $34.116M
item.description: August 14th. As per Chainalysis, an address suspected to be HashKey Capital is going to transfer 7300 ETH to Binance for sale, with an average price of $4673. 3 hours prior to this, this address withdrew 34.116 million USDT from Binance.

item.title: 0xSun: Missed Out on Over Tenfold Potential Gains in WLFI First and Second Round Due to KYC and High Price
item.description: On August 14th, Smart Money and the crypto KOL 0xsun.sol (@0xSunNFT) posted on social media, indicating that because they did not complete KYC in a timely manner and hesitated about the price, they missed the WLFI first round at $0.015 and the second round at $0.05 for subscription. A short while ago, they suddenly remembered the 1000 KYC accounts they had previously held, thus missing an opportunity for more than tenfold returns.
